Loyalis: Bamsoet Dipastikan Maju Jadi Caketum Golkar
03 Nov 2019, 17:21 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Munas Golkar tinggal sebulan lagi. Wakil Korbid Kepartaian DPP Golkar Darul Siska memastikan Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) maju sebagai caketum Golkar.
"Pak Bamsoet dipastikan maju sebagai calon Ketua Umum dalam Munas Partai Golkar yang akan datang. Saya sudah beberapa kali mengkonfirmasi hal tersebut kepada beliau," kata Darul kepada wartawan, Minggu (3/11/2019).
"Beliau mendapat dorongan yang kuat dari pemegang hak suara Munas Golkar, yaitu Ketua DPD Partai Golkar provinsi, kabupaten dan kota," imbuh loyalis Bamsoet ini.
Darul menilai majunya Bamsoet kelak menjadi calon ketua umum bukan semata inkonsisten. Menurut dia, Bamsoet malah mengedepankan tugas partai yaitu membesarkan Golkar dalam pilkada dan pemilu.
"Jika sekarang beliau menyatakan maju, jangan diartikan bahwa beliau tidak konsisten atau tidak punya integritas. Beliau maju justru mengalahkan ego pribadi karena diminta oleh jajaran partai untuk mengemban tugas yang lebih besar, yaitu membesarkan dan memenangkan Partai Golkar pada pilkada dan pemilu yang akan datang," ucapnya.
Selain itu, Darul mengatakan, apabila Bamsoet dan Ketum Golkar Airlangga Hartarto mempunyai kesepakatan sebelum Bamsoet terpilih menjadi Ketua MPR, kesepakatan tersebut bisa batal. Masa depan Golkar, kata Darul, tidak hanya ada di antara mereka berdua.
"Seandainya ada kesepakatan antara Bamsoet dan Ketua Umum, maka hal tersebut bisa batal demi kepentingan yang lebih besar, apalagi keputusan yang menyangkut masa depan Golkar tidak berada di tangan beliau berdua," sebutnya.

Loyalist: Bamsoet Ascertained to Become Golkar Caketum
Nov 03 2019, 17:21 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - The Golkar National Conference is only a month away. Golkar DPP Party Korbid Deputy Darul Siska ensured Bambang Soesatyo (Bamsoet) came forward as Golkar's caketum.
"Pak Bamsoet is sure to advance as a candidate for the General Chair in the upcoming Golkar Party National Conference. I have confirmed this to him several times," Darul told reporters on Sunday (3/11/2019).
"He received a strong encouragement from the Golkar National Conference voting rights holders, namely the Chairman of the provincial, district and city Golkar Party DPD," added the Bamsoet loyalist.
Darul assessed that the advancement of Bamsoet would later become a candidate for the chairmanship not merely inconsistent. According to him, Bamsoet instead put forward the task of the party that is raising Golkar in the elections and elections.
"If he now advances, it does not mean that he is inconsistent or does not have integrity. He has defeated his personal ego because he was asked by party ranks to carry out a bigger task, namely raising and winning the Golkar Party in the upcoming elections and elections, "he said.
In addition, Darul said, if Bamsoet and Golkar Ketum Airlangga Hartarto had an agreement before Bamsoet was elected as the Chair of the MPR, the agreement could be canceled. The future of Golkar, said Darul, is not only between the two of them.
"If there is an agreement between Bamsoet and the Chairperson, then it can be canceled in the greater interest, moreover the decision regarding the future of Golkar is not in the hands of both of them," he said.
